Body:
"""Checks that an exception nested in the benchmarking stack is raised
        when `raise_all_exceptions` is True.
        """
def broken_benchmark_replication(*args, **kwargs) ->Experiment:
    raise ValueError('Oh, exception!')
with self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, 'Oh, exception!'):
    full_benchmark_run(problems=[SimpleBenchmarkProblem(branin, noise_sd=
        0.4)], methods=[GenerationStrategy(steps=[GenerationStep(model=
        Models.SOBOL, num_trials=-1)])], num_replications=3, num_trials=5,
        raise_all_exceptions=True, benchmark_replication=
        broken_benchmark_replication)
